spiritsExplanation:
The workout video "Power Rock Row" is primarily classified under the "High-Energy & Intense" spirit, with a very high confidence score of 0.9. This is driven by the workout's focus on power, high interval format, maximum rhythm of 32, and an intensity level rated at 3 out of 3, which all indicate a demanding and vigorous session. The playlist, featuring energetic rock tracks from artists like Fall Out Boy and blink-182, further evokes a sense of intensity and drive, aligning with this spirit. 

The "Flow & Rhythm" spirit is also relevant to the workout, with a score of 0.7. The mention of rhythm and the presence of music-driven elements suggest an emphasis on coordinated, paced movements that embody flow. 

The "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit receives a score of 0.9 as the session is conducted outdoors, in Long Beach, as evidenced by the image. The setting adds an element of natural exploration and adventure. Overall, the workout combines intensity, rhythmic flow, and outdoor adventure effectively.
